snippet: Stocks edged higher as investors assessed some mixed news on company earnings. Energy stocks rose as oil recouped some of its losses.
abstract: Stocks rise slightly helped by energy companies, as oil prices stabilize.
lead_paragraph: Stocks edged higher as investors assessed some mixed news on company earnings. Energy stocks rose as oil recouped some of its losses.

headline.main: Modest Advance in the Market After Mixed Earnings Reports
headline.print_headline: Oil Gains Steady Market, but Earnings May Be Rocky
